content:
I'm happy to help! However, I think there might be some confusion. As a conversational AI, I don't have access to your personal accounts or login credentials. But I can guide you through the process of logging in to your TripAdvisor account.

To log in to your TripAdvisor account, follow these steps:

1. Go to TripAdvisor.com and click on "Log In" at the top right corner of the page.
2. Enter your email address and password in the required fields. If you've forgotten your password, you can click on "Forgot password" to reset it.
3. If you're using a social media account to log in (e.g., Facebook or Google), click on the corresponding icon.
4. Once you've entered your credentials, click "Log In" to access your account.

If you're having trouble logging in, you can try the following:

* Check that your email address and password are correct.
* Make sure you're using the correct login credentials (email address and password) associated with your TripAdvisor account.
* Clear your browser's cookies and try logging in again.
* Contact TripAdvisor's customer support if you're still having issues.

Once you're logged in, you can write and submit your review for the Westin New York at Times Square. Your feedback will help other travelers make informed decisions about their stays!
